__TOC__

=== What ===

Party like a bunch of wild Ibexes! B)

=== Who ===

Everyone is invited.  This means families if so inclined. 

If you want to be there, just RSVP for the party location of your choice below.

=== Where (Place) & When ===

The Orlando party will be, 11/08/08, between 12 - 6 pm EST.  

We will start at <nowiki>[[http://www.panerabread.com|Panera Bread]]</nowiki> for some coffee, Wifi, Installfest and general geeking and end at (6 pm) <nowiki>[[http://www.huhot.com/orlando_florida.asp|Hu-hot Mongolian Grill]]</nowiki> for some eats.

This is only one of a few parties that we are planning.  If you plan to have a party any where else in Florida please list it as Intrepid Release Party <location> below.

==== Intrepid Release Party Orlando ====
<nowiki>[[File:ubun100x100.png]]</nowiki>  

Details of the Intrepid Release Party Orlando

'''Date''': 11/08/08

'''Time''': 12 - 6 pm.  I <nowiki>[[pak33m]]</nowiki> will reserve a meeting room for us all.  When you arrive you will see a big Ubuntu banner that DanTrevino will hang so nicely outside the meeting room.

'''Where''': Starting at <nowiki>[[http://tinyurl.com/6nxrz3|Panera Bread]]</nowiki> and end up at <nowiki>[[http://www.huhot.com/orlando_florida.asp|Hu-hot Mongolian Grill]]</nowiki>.  Both are in the area of the Florida Mall.

'''What''': Social meetup and install fest to celebrate the release.

'''What to bring''': Yourself, friends, computers, fun, CDs (maybe real CDs from shipit), presentations, etc.  The meeting room at Panera Bread should accommodate power plugs for all but I will bring an extension cord.

'''Team Contact''': <nowiki>[[pak33m]]</nowiki>

If you plan to attend please RSVP below.
